Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.projections

Visualization projections

See: Description


  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FullProjection
    Full vector space projections.
    Projection
    Base interface used for projections in the ELKI visualizers.
    Projection1D
    Interface for projections that have a specialization to only compute the first component.
    Projection2D
    Projections that have specialized methods to only compute the first two dimensions of the projection.
    ProjectionParallel
    Projection to parallel coordinates that allows reordering and inversion of axes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFullProjection
    Abstract base class for full projections.
    AbstractProjection
    Abstract base projection class.
    AbstractSimpleProjection
    Abstract base class for "simple" projections.
    AffineProjection
    Affine projections are the most general class.
    CanvasSize
    Size of a canvas.
    OPTICSProjection
    OPTICS projection.
    Simple1D
    Dimension-selecting 1D projection.
    Simple2D
    Dimension-selecting 2D projection.
    SimpleParallel
    Simple parallel projection Scaled space: reordered, scaled and inverted.

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.projections Description
